channel.title: Dementhium 639 ItemDefEditor error
channel.description:
Well, I get an error with my ItemDefEditor, I have a .bat that runs it and have even tried using Eclipse to see if it would work, no luck, I got the same error. The ShopEditor, DropEditor, Etc, all work fine, but this one does not. I tried downloading completely new sources to make sure I didn't mess anything up, and I still got the same error. I've been searching all night and found similair things, but not quite any help that would get me to solve this. [CODE]Loading cache... Loaded cache! Loading item definitions... Loaded 20430 item definitions. Loading range weapon info... Loaded 186 range weapon definitions. Loading range ammunition info... Loaded 223 ammunition definitions. Exception in thread "AWT-EventQueue-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at com.sun.java.swing.plaf.windows.XPStyle.getTypeEnumName(Unknown Sourc e) at com.sun.java.swing.plaf.windows.XPStyle.getBorder(Unknown Source) at com.sun.java.swing.plaf.windows.WindowsLookAndFeel$XPBorderValue.getX PValue(Unknown Source) at com.sun.java.swing.plaf.windows.WindowsLookAndFeel$XPValue.createValu e(Unknown Source) at javax.swing.UIDefaults.getFromHashtable(Unknown Source) at javax.swing.UIDefaults.get(Unknown Source) at javax.swing.MultiUIDefaults.get(Unknown Source) at javax.swing.UIDefaults.getBorder(Unknown Source) at javax.swing.UIManager.getBorder(Unknown Source) at I read about someone having the same error with shophandler I believe, but people told him that he messed it up. I downloaded fresh sources and still got this error, So I have no clue :'( Any help you could give would be appreciated, thanks :D

item.title: Dementhium 639 ItemDefEditor error
item.dc:creator: @Xarioth Xarioth
item.description:

Well, I get an error with my ItemDefEditor, I have a .bat that runs it and have even tried using Eclipse to see if it would work, no luck, I got the same error.
